trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDividerDoubleClick" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDividerDoubleClick" /> 事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDividerDoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDividerDoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDividerDoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDividerDoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column next to the column divider that was double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 已双击的列分隔符旁边列的索引。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs" /> containing the inherited event data.
trans-unit.target: 一个新的、包含继承的事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDividerDoubleClickEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDividerDoubleClickEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDividerDoubleClickEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> property using the `columnIndex` value.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDividerDoubleClickEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>属性使用`columnIndex`值。

trans-unit.source: The values of properties inherited from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs> are initialized to the values specified in `e`.
trans-unit.target: 属性的值继承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs>初始化中指定的值为`e`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> 小于 -1。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column next to the column divider that was double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 已双击的列分隔符旁边列的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column next to the divider.
trans-unit.target: 该分隔符旁边的列的索引。

trans-unit.source: This method indicates the column to the left of the double-clicked divider if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.No>; otherwise, it indicates the column to the right of the double-clicked divider.
trans-unit.target: 此方法指示在双击分隔符左侧的列，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.No>; 否则为它指示在双击分隔符右侧的列。

trans-unit.source: The index is the zero-based index of the column in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection.
trans-unit.target: 索引是中的列的从零开始索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDividerDoubleClick?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDividerDoubleClick?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDividerDoubleClick?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDividerDoubleClick?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。
